wikipedia_page.main: Sir Benjamin Collins Brodie, 1st Baronet,  (9 June 1783 – 21 October 1862) was an English physiologist and surgeon who pioneered research into bone and joint disease.

response: It was dedicated by Gray to Sir Benjamin Collins Brodie, 1st Baronet.
